P R O D U C T

CrowdResolve

Our crowdfunding and commission platform serves as a catalyst for transforming aspirations into achievements. Whether it's funding a passion project, supporting a social cause, or seeking assistance with a task, we bring individuals together to create meaningful impact.

With transparent processes and a supportive community, we aim to democratize fundraising and empower individuals to pursue their dreams with confidence.

F E A T U R E S

Witness the amazing features

Our platform offers intuitive campaign creation, seamless payment processing, and robust engagement tools to help you reach your fundraising goals effortlessly. Join our community and unlock the power to make a difference today.

F U N C T I O N S

CrowdResolve

  • Step 1
    User Registration

    Begin your journey by securely logging into our platform. Enter your credentials - username and password - to gain access to your account.

  • Step 2
    User Dashboard

    Welcome to your personalized dashboard â€“ the central hub for managing your activities and interactions on our platform. Access key features and insights at a glance.

  • Step 3
    Choose an Action

    Initiate crowdfunding or commissions effortlessly. Define goals for campaigns, or specify project requirements for commissions. Explore diverse projects tailored to your interests.

  • Step 4
    Browse, Choose, Contribute

    Discover and support crowdfunding campaigns or commission opportunities effortlessly. Review details and contribute seamlessly. Explore diverse ventures tailored to your interests with ease.

  • Step 5
    Accomplish your needs

    Seamlessly achieve your objectives. Our platform simplifies the process, offering tailored opportunities to fund projects or fulfill tasks effortlessly.

  • Step 6
    Notifications and Confirmation

    Stay updated with timely notifications and receive instant confirmations for every action you take on our platform.

A B O U T U S

Empower Dreams

Welcome to CrowdResolve, where we empower dreams and foster community-driven impact.

Our Mission: To provide a platform where individuals can connect, collaborate, and make a difference in the world.

Our Story: Inspired by the belief that everyone deserves a chance to succeed, we founded CrowdResolve to democratize fundraising and empower individuals to pursue their passions.

Our Team: We are a dedicated group of individuals behind CrowdResolve, committed to driving positive change and fostering community-driven impact. Get to know us and discover the faces behind our platform's mission and vision.

Next Section
F A Q S

Frequently Asked Questions

Our platform accepts a variety of cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, ICP, and most stablecoins. This provides users with flexibility in funding projects or commissions using their preferred digital assets.

Safeguarding the integrity of our platform is paramount. We implement rigorous verification processes, including identity verification for project creators and review procedures for project submissions. Additionally, our community-driven approach encourages user participation in flagging suspicious or fraudulent activities, further enhancing project legitimacy.

Withdrawing funds or payments from the platform is a straightforward process. Users can navigate to their account dashboard and initiate withdrawal requests, specifying the desired withdrawal method and amount. Depending on the withdrawal method chosen, funds are typically transferred to the user's designated wallet or bank account within a specified timeframe.

Our platform accommodates a diverse range of projects spanning various categories, including but not limited to creative endeavors, social initiatives, entrepreneurial ventures, and educational pursuits. Users can fund or commission projects related to art, technology, social causes, education, and more.

In the event that a campaign fails to reach its funding goal within the specified timeframe, all contributions made to the campaign are typically refunded to the respective backers. This ensures that backers are not charged unless the campaign successfully reaches its funding target, providing a risk-free environment for supporting projects.

Disputes between campaign creators and backers are handled with fairness and transparency. Our platform provides mechanisms for communication and mediation, allowing parties to address concerns and seek resolution amicably. In cases where disputes cannot be resolved directly, our support team may intervene to facilitate a satisfactory outcome.
